page.title: 13 A Normal School Day
page.content: I got up at 7.30 a.m. and put my radio on. When I had dressed, I went into our Leah's room and told her to get up. My breakfast was on the table when I came down stairs. At 8.45 a.m. I called for Vanessa and we went to School for registration. Mr. Webster took us for English until 10.25 when we went out to play. For the rest of the morning we had maths with Mr. McMillan and art and craft with Mrs. Sheridon. I went home for dinner and called for Vanessa at 1.10. We played skipping in the play ground until afternoon school at 1.30. Mr. McMillan took us for social studies and then we had games with Mrs Sheridon. We larked "rounders". At 3.30 I went home and played out until 5.30 when I had my tea. In the evening I watched Coronation Street and Dallas on TV before going to bed at 10.30 pm.
